I mean the lady got a good owner, killed her scumbag Ex in defense of the first man to treat her nicely even though it would cost her and despite getting her brain fried her new owner was still willing to keep her and treat her better then most. I first read this one a while ago in my native language so this is the 2nd time, after reading the finale of the Doll series. Gotta say I’d recommend this series to ppl, not just this side story only. It was a long ride, there were proud and not-so-proud faps, still I like Fan for all his efforts he has put into this series. It’s funny to see how not only women, but also men are controlled by the invisible collar made from this “love doll” thingy. I like the way Fan demonstrated this story from so many perspectives, showing that everyone is just dolls tangled by the strings they don’t even aware of. This is definitely the best in the series imo, even tho it’s too deep for a doujin. 
We shall meet again when this series receive an adaption, because it fucking deserves that

"So I want to point out first I can't find any info on if Fan no Hitori is a woman or man. Artists are notorious for masking themselves HUKE always wears a mask in public for example. In fact I think Fan no Hitori is a woman seeing is the almost all of the protagonists in their stories is a woman. It's easier for a writer to write what they know and from that perspective. Second we know the writer uses parallels in their writing like how Parasite Queen is a giant metaphor for the relation between high sexual activity and STDs. So let's look at the dolls stories every person who has owned one has been pretty much looked at as a garbage person so Fan clearly doesn't want you to look positively at the situation and if you do you are equivalent to those garbage people. Not that Fan doesn't want you to get off on it. So ultimately here's what I think Fan wanted to pull from this series: This is how she sees women in Japan being treated, either that or prostitution." -Evidenox
